summary: Email correspondence between law enforcement officials discussing obtaining a schedule of accounts/entities from UBS related to Ghislaine Maxwell, in order to issue a follow-up subpoena. The document indicates ongoing financial investigation into Maxwell's assets.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses obtaining UBS account schedules and entities related to her, indicating a financial investigation.

events.title: Request for UBS account information on Maxwell
events.description: Law enforcement officials correspond to obtain a schedule of UBS accounts/entities related to Ghislaine Maxwell to prepare a follow-up subpoena.

keyFacts: Law enforcement was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell's financial accounts at UBS as of June 2020.
The investigation involved obtaining schedules of accounts and entities held by Maxwell at UBS.
A follow-up subpoena related to these accounts was being prepared.
The correspondence indicates coordination between different law enforcement officials (NY and FBI are mentioned in the headers).
